data.text:
Colorful celebration of Ethiopian New Year (Enkutatash) on board Ethiopian flight from Addis Ababa to Lagos, Nigeria.

https://t.co/iIlxpkVLk3

The window view always offers unique sights! Send us pictures, tag us, and use #ETmoments. We will be happy to share them back with you. 
#FlyEthiopian #WindowViewWednesday https://t.co/tniN2ejk16

Our fleet size is growing fast! We have taken delivery of our 32nd  Dash 8- Q400 aircraft. 
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/1Atf6yXG0v
Thank you for flying with us! #flyethiopian https://t.co/LAl1hWNhPL
